channel.title: Look i cant run any client only moparscape's! help!
channel.description:
i made my client but i keep getting this error last week it was working now today its not and i need it to work!
this is what error i get Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue . . .
i dont know why but i need help! heres the pic
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/com.jpg[/img]

item.title: Look i cant run any client only moparscape's! help!
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

[quote=“The Moose, post:2, topic:125792”]Compile server first.[/quote]That is the worst information I have ever heard in my life. Try putting this in your compiler/runclient.

@echo off TITLE United PK Client :menu COLOR 09 echo United PK Client echo. echo Type c to compile the client. echo Type r to run the client. echo Type cr to compile, then run the client. echo Type e to exit. echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==c goto compile if %option%==C goto compile if %option%==cr goto CR if %option%==CR goto CR if %option%==Cr goto CR if %option%==cR goto CR if %option%==rc goto CR if %option%==RC goto CR if %option%==Rc goto CR if %option%==rC goto CR if %option%==r goto run if %option%==R goto run if %option%==e goto exit if %option%==E goto exit if %option%==* goto error goto error :compile cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java pause cls goto menu :CR cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI pause cls goto menu :run cls JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI :exit cls exit :error echo An error has occured! echo Press enter to go back to the main menu pause goto menuChange the names, it’s my compiler that I made from scratch :D.

Read full topic
